titles: Roman forgeries, or, A true account of false records discovering the impostures and counterfeit antiquities of the Church of Rome / by a faithful son of the Church of England.
author: Traherne, Thomas, d. 1674.
publisher: Printed by S. and B. Griffin, for Jonathan Edwin ...,
notes: Written by T. Traherne. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
